Journalist. Climate, water, forests, wildlife, global healing. Dad, skier, traveler, muffin-maker.

#Climate & #Energy research at #IIASA | author of #IPCC #SR15 (2018) | co-chair #AAR2 | board member Climate Change Center Austria (#CCCA) | #ScientistsForFuture | #FreeTheModels & #FAIRdata for #openscience

 Content: 
- 75% work: research on #Climate (mostly mitigation), #ScientificSoftware, #FAIRdata, #opensource & #freethemodels, ... (mostly English)
